basics.label: Systems Engineering Manager
basics.summary: Multifaceted Technical Manager with a broad spectrum of experience and knowledge excelling at being a conduit between the technical domain and financial processes. Proficient in numerous areas from hardware engineering, software engineering and subcontracts management.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Technical Program Manager for LCS Game Based Learning dealing with 63 Systems Engineers, Software Engineers, Test Engineers, Technical Artists and Game Developers. Responsible for $55M worth of training software development and managing subcontractors including budget, scope and schedule.
highlights: Led setup of cross-functional team development, resulting in $12M+ cost savings.
Engineered an enterprise architecture that included a game development tool suite used enterprise-wide.
Technical contact point for the US Navy on product design, schedule, and budget reviews.
Managed Game Based Learning for Emirates Airlines Cabin Crews, working with 7 engineering teams.
Evolved a mobile training platform serving over 20,000 trainees on multiple mobile platforms.
Participated in the design of over $20M worth of heavy equipment for the LCS Mission Bay Trainer(MBT) Proposal.
Led architectural development for training courseware for the LCS ships, inclusive of $300M software development.
Worked on the System Design and Requirements for the M134a Dillon Minigun Simulator.
Mechanical Engineer for design and production of the Bradley Fighting Vehicle Simulator - performance award recipient for opto-mechanical design.
Developed a physics system for damage assessment on a MIG-29A fighter aircraft.
Six degree of freedom physics model for a C-17 aircraft
Worked as a Physics Consultant - Developed a physics model of water flow and pressure against human muscle.
